scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-delete &&  npm run deploy-copy && npm run deploy-set-cache && npm run deploy-invalidate-cache
scripts.deploy-delete: s3cmd del --recursive s3://jacobmortensen.com/static/ && s3cmd del --recursive s3://jacobmortensen.com/favicons/ && s3cmd del s3://jacobmortensen.com/index.html
scripts.deploy-set-cache: s3cmd --recursive modify --add-header="Cache-Control:public, max-age=31536000" s3://jacobmortensen.com/static/ && s3cmd --recursive modify --add-header="Cache-Control:public, max-age=31536000" s3://jacobmortensen.com/favicons/
scripts.resize-backgrounds: mogrify -path ./src/Header/images/backgrounds/medium/ -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -thumbnail 640 -unsharp 0.25x0.25+8+0.065 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 -define jpeg:fancy-upsampling=off -define png:compression-filter=5 -define png:compression-level=9 -define png:compression-strategy=1 -define png:exclude-chunk=all -interlace none -colorspace sRGB -strip ./src/Header/images/backgrounds/*
